name: windows_system_running_processes
pattern: {"platform": "windows", "description": "ATT&CK: T1034,T1121,T1117,T1085", "queries": {"system_running_processes": {"query": "select processes.pid, processes.name, users.username, processes.path, processes.cmdline from processes LEFT JOIN users ON processes.uid = users.uid WHERE processes.path != '';", "interval": 3600, "description": "List Windows System running processes. - ATT&CK T1034,T1121,T1117,T1085"}, "snapshot_system_running_processes": {"query": "select processes.pid, processes.name, users.username, processes.path from processes LEFT JOIN users ON processes.uid = users.uid WHERE processes.path != '';", "interval": 28800, "description": "Snapshot List Windows System running processes - ATT&CK T1034,T1121,T1117,T1085", "snapshot": true}}, "name": "windows_system_running_processes"}
